dataList.dlg: I like this new look in your eyes. You've finally understood that I am *not* your prey.

I suppose forever hanging from the starless, moonless ceiling is like living in an unending night.
... Tsk, I suppose I'm not the one to talk.
The Noon of Violet, is it? Sounds like an opportunity to see all hell break loose again. Heh, I'm looking forward to getting another look at that mysterious, artistically inspiring stele.
We'll soon be hearing the voices of the fools who went 'missing' in that containment unit. Isn't this a nice lullaby to fall asleep to?
More cocoons, is it? Disappointing. I thought I'd have some more time to enjoy the show. Not that I'd bother saving them, of course.

You've been making all these cocoons just to feed your children...?
Hmph. It's nothing more than the curse of instinct.

That green tincan's probably still hopped up on Enkephalin.
If you've got any questions about the Safety Team, go ask that depressing guy wearing a coffin like it's a backpack.

I like that my affinity with Spiderhead's allowed me to wield Skullface as well... but their endless chatter is getting annoying.
One constantly nagging me for food, the other lecturing me about 'the good' and 'justice' every other minute...

Stay cooped up in the elevator if you're not going to fight, cowards.
If you're willing to fight, merge up and stand still. If the manager misses because you couldn't even sit still for a minute... then you better get ready to get F.L.A.T.
This silence... Is that fool of a manager already unloading Execution Bullets?
Ever seen an E.G.O this well-tamed? This multi-eyed one just feels so natural in my hand.
Time to go, Skullface and Spiderhead. Let's flatten them.
Shut up, S.F. I decide whose skull to bust.
Patience, S.H. I'll feed you something soon.
Don't stare at these eyes for too long. I won't help you if it snares you in its trance.
Get ready to have your skull cracked open.
Isn't this a nice spread for a meal, S.H?
I know. Shut up.
Agh...
My sins are mine to deal with, S.F.
The eyes close shut... and the lights... fade...
That art was worth a closer inspection.
Manager. Did you even read the Observation Logs?
Hah, looks like the other departments have been busy. Looking forward to enjoying an art gallery on my way back.
Don't delude yourselves, S.F, S.H. I'm not strong because I wield you. I wield you *because* I am strong.
We'll soon hear the sweet melodies of the trumpets followed by a harmony of screams. The dear manager'll have a hell of a time cleaning this mess up. I'm looking forward to enjoying it... heh.
